column3: str

Uin Nee wants help in testing a new love potion. What could possibly go wrong?

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Test the fake true love potion on the dozing Nu Mou in Pla Enni.
Report to Uin Nee.

Dearest mortal, is there anything more tragic than unrequited love? Nay! Nay, says I! Oh, the heartbreak! The pining! The woe! How could anyone with a shred of compassion in their heart ignore a mortal so besieged by melancholy longings!?
Not me! And that's why I made a love potion! Well, a dream love potion. A real one would be downright creepy! We fae do have some scruples, you know.
The problem is, I'm new to all of this alchemy nonsense, and I have no idea if my potion will work! I keep trying to sneak up on sleeping Nu Mou to test it, but it's like they can smell me coming!

I'm sure that you could manage it, though! And I <Emphasis>know</Emphasis> you wouldn't want to stand in the way of true love! Well, fake true love. Well, dream fake true love. Anyway! Go and test the potion!
No... Stop eating...my house... <snore>
Wha─!?
Goodness, if it isn't the very hero who restored to us the night!
What brings you here today? And looking so lovely, I might add! Yes... I daresay I've never seen such a divine visage in all my life...
W-Wait! I didn't mean to express my undying affectio─ Oh no! I've done it again!
Please, um... Please read this, when you have a moment. Which will likely be never, as I'm sure you're most busy being clever and courageous and─ Er, forget that I said anything!
Oh, I knew the leafmen would come for me! It was only a matter of time!
You tested it? And? And!?
Oooh, a letter written in fae! Let me see!
Hmm... Oh <Emphasis>dear</Emphasis>... Well, that's─ Oooh. And... Ahahaha! Haha... Oh, that doesn't even rhyme! HahahaHAHAHA!

Haha... <wheeze> Ahem! You probably shouldn't look at this. It's <Emphasis>painfully</Emphasis> embarrassing. For them, and also for you. But don't worry─the potion will wear off after a while, and they won't remember a thing!
It looks like I might need to water it down a bit for next time, though. There's smitten, and then there's...whatever in the name of Titania that drivel was supposed to be. Back to the cauldron I go!
Huh. That's interesting. Now, if they had seen an irresistibly attractive leafman, it might still be usable, but that doesn't seem to be the case...

Maybe it didn't work because Nu Mou are too different from you mortals? Or maybe that specific Nu Mou has a bizarre fixation on leafmen! I could check their dreams to make sure, but I'm a little afraid of what I might find...
Best to try a different formula, I think! I can count on you to test a new batch when I'm done, right? Of course I can!
